original_text: She has caused many men to fall. Because of her, too many men have thrown away their lives.
korean_text: 대저 그가 많은 사람을 상하여 엎드러지게 하였나니 그에게 죽은 자가 허다하니라

sentences.original_text: She has caused many men to fall.
too many men have thrown away their lives.
sentences.korean_translation: 너무나 많은 남자들이 그들의 생명을 버렸다.
